Description.Chinese: Makes Oil kind of a normal product that can be bought at neutral traders and enables passive trade at your kontor. Unfortunately this also means all ships can transport oil, but you still need oil-ship for oil traderoutes.
Description.English: Makes Oil kind of a normal product that can be bought at neutral traders and enables passive trade at your kontor. Unfortunately this also means all ships can transport oil, but you still need oil-ship for oil traderoutes.
Description.French: Makes Oil kind of a normal product that can be bought at neutral traders and enables passive trade at your kontor. Unfortunately this also means all ships can transport oil, but you still need oil-ship for oil traderoutes.
Description.German: Macht aus Öl teilweise ein normales Produkt, welches zb bei neutralen Händlern aktiv oder passiv in deinem Kontor gekauft werden kann. Leider bedeutet das auch, dass nun jedes Schiff Öl transportieren kann, aber man braucht den Öltanker weiterhin für Öl-Handelsrouten.
